title: How to Install Safari

steps.headline: On Mac, drag the application to your dock.
steps.description: On Windows, do whatever you have to do to get it on your desktop.

steps.headline: Access the internet in a sleek new way!
steps.description: (Or old way if you have tried it before)

text: Go to www.apple.com/safari  Click "Safari 5 Free Download"  Choose your operating system.  Click "Download Now"  Run the installer  On Mac, drag the application to your dock. On Windows, do whatever you have to do to get it on your desktop. Open the program  Access the internet in a sleek new way! (Or old way if you have tried it before)
sentences: Go to www.apple.com/safari  Click "Safari 5 Free Download"  Choose your operating system.
Click "Download Now"  Run the installer  On Mac, drag the application to your dock.
On Windows, do whatever you have to do to get it on your desktop.
Open the program  Access the internet in a sleek new way!
(Or old way if you have tried it before)
